Text: 300 and Gladiator were 2234234256x better. not to mention Rome on HBO. this is "meh"-quality rehash material, but if you gotta get your rocks off with some genre junk and violence then go for it. just dont expect much.
this is the one that started all the gay-gladiator genre. was back in the 60's with kirk douglas and steven boyd's "kiss of death"
